Posts.Content: LeighLeigh wrote: I am BRCA1 positive, and am looking for Dr/Plastic Surgeon recommendations.  I am exploring the option of PBMastectomy, and am interested in a Dr (in the Dallas area) that will perform a nipple sparing surgery, possible one-step procedure.  Any advice, referrals is greatly appreciated.   I don't think I am interested in any flap procedures...Thanks in advance.
